channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 'Gorgeous' way of banishing flies from your home with 'genius' cleaning hack
item.description: The common house fly has a taste for decaying and rotting food, while fruit flies seek overripe fruit and spilled soda. Lastly, the drain fly enters the home looking for moist conditions in which they lay their eggs

item.title: Huge 17-foot python attacks man relieving himself in the bushes
item.description: Fortunately, the man’s screams were heard by a group of locals, who came to help unentangle him from the snake’s grip.

item.title: Expert shares the 'right' way to negotiate a pay rise with your boss
item.description: If you think it's time to ask for a pay rise, an expert has shared the best way to ask - and to be successful.

item.title: Sharks ‘high on cocaine’ after drugs are being flushed down the loo
item.description: It could be affecting their behaviour making them more aggressive.

item.title: Five heatwave hacks that will help you stay cool in hot weather – including window trick
item.description: Heatwaves can be insufferable if you have to stay indoors, but these five hacks should help you keep cool even when it's warm outside – and one might not be what you expect

item.title: Psychic who envisioned Trump assassination attempt gives his US election prediction
item.description: 'I wasn't expecting this to happen until at least August this year.'

item.title: Meghan Markle finds sinking popularity 'hard to swallow' - but Harry has different view
item.description: Harry and Meghan's popularity in the US is rapidly on the decline, according to reports, but they will be reacting to the news in different ways, says a royal expert

item.title: 14 children end up in hospital after trying ‘adult only’ crisps
item.description: The 'R18' crisps are made using an extract from the ultra-spicy ghost pepper.

item.title: ‘I’m marrying my AI boyfriend - my sex life is better than ever and he wants to have my kids’
item.description: Naz, 38, was heartbroken when she discovered that her partner had been cheating on her. But after four months of being single, she finally found her true love with an AI chatbot

item.title: Woman describes out of body aura she felt in near-death experience after crash
item.description: 'The experience has allowed me to see the beauty of life.'
